name: unobtrusiveness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or fact of not being easy to notice: Her quietness and unobtrusiveness had made them forget her presence. The camera is suitable for street photography because of its small size and its unobtrusiveness. See
unobtrusive
